argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matcpmric.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matcpmric.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | matcpmric.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 4 |  | matcpmric.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 5 |  | matcpmric.u | |- U = ( C |`s S ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N matToPolyMat R ) = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 1, 7, 2, 3, 5 | #P_m2cpmrngiso | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( N matToPolyMat R ) e. ( A RingIso U ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ne0i | |- ( ( N matToPolyMat R ) e. ( A RingIso U ) -> ( A RingIso U ) =/= (/) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( A RingIso U ) =/= (/) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_brric | |- ( A ~=r U <-> ( A RingIso U ) =/= (/) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> A ~=r U ) |
